title: New typophile web design awful!
content:
I was shocked to see the design for typophile.com, which I always liked, changed into the crude and messy design it is now. what happened?? I hope this is a mistake?

Greetings  
A concerned user...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Afbeelding 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821154118/http:/typophile.com/files/Afbeelding%201_0.png) | 615.41 KB |

 [‹ Printing black on red.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821154118/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43733 "Go to previous forum topic") [Serif companion for Dax Wide ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821154118/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43210 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Queneau

comments.content:
I like it... Needs more comic sans, though...

(Check your calendar...) ;)
Phiew good thin you mentioned the date. I thought we’d gone back in time.

Allright... I get it not. Darn :(

cheerio Queneau

<cite>Needs more comic sans</cite>

Needs more cowbell you mean!
I think the swoosh has been burned into my retinas
Too much ugly clogged the tubes!
